author: jeongeun
body:
#### PR description:
Move Sequence to Task for RecoJets RecoMET cff python files.
(An extension of the previous task [PR#25163](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25163), [PR#27474](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27474) , [PR#27640](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27640))

Tested in CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-08-26-1100 release, The PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Move Sequence to Task RecoJets RecoMET
